name: All InX
description: ANT, the native token of All InX, powers transactions, incentivizes participation, and enables decentralized governance across the platform's multi-chain infrastructure.All InX is a global “Exchange of Everything,” a tri-sector crypto financial platform integrating RWA (Real World Assets), derivatives, and intelligent asset management. It focuses on the digitalization, circulation, and appreciation of assets. By adopting a CeDeFi architecture that combines the strengths of CeFi and DeFi, All InX builds a comprehensive ecosystem covering asset issuance, staking incentives, derivatives trading, governance, and payments. All InX is committed to building the next-generation capital operating system where “everything can be tokenized, everything can be traded,” bridging on-chain users with real-world assets and unlocking value and liquidity across the global capital system.
